mapper.select: select d.doctorName doctorName,d.doctorId from doctor d, paiban p where d.doctorId=p.doctorId and p.one != '无班'
select d.doctorName doctorName,d.doctorId from doctor d, paiban p where d.doctorId=p.doctorId and p.two != '无班'
select d.doctorName doctorName,d.doctorId from doctor d, paiban p where d.doctorId=p.doctorId and p.three != '无班'
select d.doctorName doctorName,d.doctorId from doctor d, paiban p where d.doctorId=p.doctorId and p.four != '无班'
select d.doctorName doctorName,d.doctorId from doctor d, paiban p where d.doctorId=p.doctorId and p.five != '无班'
select d.doctorName doctorName,d.doctorId from doctor d, paiban p where d.doctorId=p.doctorId and p.six != '无班'
select d.doctorName doctorName,d.doctorId from doctor d, paiban p where d.doctorId=p.doctorId and p.seven != '无班'
